sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_2c2aa692db32c210b1ba54ebd396196e
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.tablesToPurge</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>script inctude with functions for purfing records fromthe tables</description><name>tablesToPurge</name><script><![CDATA[var tablesToPurge = Class.create();
tablesToPurge.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},
    /**
     *function returns list of tables for purging 
     * @returns  {Array}   tables to purge.
     **/
    process: function() {
        var propTabs = gs.getProperty('dhlex.purge.tables', 'sys_journal_field,x_104357_sec_inc_shipment');
        return propTabs.split(',');
    },

    /**
     * Function that returns true/false if record from purging table should be picked for purging 
     * @param  {String} tName - name of the table 
     * @param  {String} maxJobs - maximum jobs run on this instance
     * output  {boolean} 
     */
    getJob: function(tName, maxJobs) {
        var runningJobs = new global.GlideQuery(tName)
            .where('u_status', 5).count();
        var jobsToRun = maxJobs - runningJobs;
        return jobsToRun > 0;
    },

    /**
     * Function for purging the reccords according to the encoded query in purging table record 
     * @param  {String} tName - name of the table to count from
     * output - NO
     */

    purgeFrom: function(tName, sName) {
        var grUEPT = new GlideRecord(tName);
        grUEPT.addEncodedQuery("u_condition!=NULL^u_status=4");
        grUEPT.orderBy('u_start_date');
        grUEPT.setLimit(1);
        grUEPT.query();
        if (grUEPT.next()) {
            //this.deleteRecords(grUEPT.getValue('u_table_name'), grUEPT.getValue('u_condition'), false, grUEPT.getUniqueValue(),sName);
            this.mDeleteRecords(grUEPT.getValue('u_table_name'), grUEPT.getValue('u_condition'), false, grUEPT.getUniqueValue(), sName);
        }
    },

    /**
     * Function to count the records from table based on the encoded query 
     * @param  {String} tableName - name of the table to count from
     * @param  {String} encQuery - Encoded query string
     * output - writes in the log the counts
     */
    countRecords: function(tableName, encQuery) {
        var countObj = new GlideAggregate(tableName);
        if (!gs.nil(encQuery)) {
            countObj.addEncodedQuery(encQuery);
        }
        countObj.addAggregate("COUNT");
        countObj.query();
        while (countObj.next()) {
            var count = countObj.getAggregate("COUNT");
            return count;
        }
    },

    /**
     * Function that will delete the records using deleteMultiple from table based on the encoded query.
     * @param  {String} tableName - name of the table to count from
     * @param  {String} encQuery Encoded query string
     * @param  {bolean} sWorkflow - specifies if th BRs anf Workflouws should be run
     * @param  {ARRAYobj} ordObj - object specifies the order and field to order by 
     * output - writes in the log the message adout delete 
     */
    multiDeleteRecords: function(tableName, encodedQry, sWorkflow) {
        var dObj = new GlideRecord(tableName);
        if (!gs.nil(encodedQry)) {
            dObj.addEncodedQuery(encodedQry);
        }

        dObj.query();
        if (!gs.nil(sWorkflow)) {
            dObj.setWorkflow(sWorkflow);
        }
        dObj.deleteMultiple();
        //this.logger.logInfo("Fixscript Deleted: '" +  + "': records from table: " + tableName);
    },

    /**
     * Function that will delete the records one by one from table based on the encoded query.
     * @param  {String} tableName - name of the table to count from
     * @param  {String} deleteQuery Encoded query string
     * @param  {bolean} sWorkflow - specifies if th BRs anf Workflouws should be run
     * output - writes in the log the message adout delete 
     */
    deleteRecords: function(tableName, deleteQuery, sWorkflow, purgeJobID, schName) {
        var batchNum = gs.getProperty('dhlex.purge.batch.size', 50000); //modifyable if needed - number of records to delete in one batch 
        var rowCount = 1;
        var pJob = new GlideRecord('u_ecase_purge_table');
        if (pJob.get(purgeJobID)) {
            pJob.setValue('u_status', 5);
            pJob.setValue('u_executed_by', schName);
            pJob.setValue('u_purge_start', gs.nowDateTime());
            pJob.update();

            var delObj = new GlideRecord(tableName);
            delObj.addEncodedQuery(deleteQuery);
            delObj.setLimit(batchNum);
            while (rowCount > 0) {

                delObj.query();
                delObj.setWorkflow(sWorkflow);
                rowCount = delObj.getRowCount();
                while (delObj.next()) {
                    delObj.deleteRecord();
                }

                var purge_duration = GlideDateTime.subtract(new GlideDateTime(pJob.getValue('u_purge_start')), new GlideDateTime(gs.nowDateTime())).getDisplayValue();

                var tmplog = pJob.getValue('u_log') + "\n" + gs.nowDateTime() + " Job Deleted in '" + tableName + "' table " + rowCount + " records - it is already purging " + purge_duration;
 
                pJob.setValue('u_log', tmplog);
                pJob.u_already_deleted = pJob.u_already_deleted + rowCount;
                pJob.setValue('u_purge_duration', purge_duration);
                pJob.update();
            }
            pJob.setValue('u_status', 6);
            pJob.setValue('u_purge_end', gs.nowDateTime());
            pJob.update();

        }
    },

    /**
     * Function that will delete multiple records from table based on the encoded query.
     * @param  {String} tableName - name of the table to count from
     * @param  {String} deleteQuery Encoded query string
     * @param  {bolean} sWorkflow - specifies if th BRs anf Workflouws should be run
     * output - writes in the log the message adout delete 
     */
    mDeleteRecords: function(tableName, deleteQuery, sWorkflow, purgeJobID, schName) {
        var batchNum = gs.getProperty('dhlex.purge.batch.size', 50000); //modifyable if needed - number of records to delete in one batch 
        var rowCount = 1;
        var pJob = new GlideRecord('u_ecase_purge_table');
        if (pJob.get(purgeJobID)) {
            pJob.setValue('u_status', 5);
            pJob.setValue('u_executed_by', schName);
            pJob.setValue('u_purge_start', gs.nowDateTime());
            pJob.update();

            var delObj = new GlideRecord(tableName);
            delObj.addEncodedQuery(deleteQuery);
            delObj.setLimit(batchNum);
            while (rowCount > 0) {
                var recordsToBeDel = [];
                delObj.query();
                delObj.setWorkflow(sWorkflow);
                rowCount = delObj.getRowCount();
                while (delObj.next()) {
                    recordsToBeDel.push(delObj.getValue("sys_id"));
                }
                this.mDelete(tableName, recordsToBeDel); //delete the records in the array created using below function
            

            var purge_duration = GlideDateTime.subtract(new GlideDateTime(pJob.getValue('u_purge_start')), new GlideDateTime(gs.nowDateTime())).getDisplayValue();

            var tmplog = pJob.getValue('u_log') + "\n" + gs.nowDateTime() + " Job Deleted in '" + tableName + "' table " + rowCount + " records - it is already purging " + purge_duration;

            pJob.setValue('u_log', tmplog);
            pJob.u_already_deleted = pJob.u_already_deleted + rowCount;
            pJob.setValue('u_purge_duration', purge_duration);
            pJob.update();
			}
        }
        pJob.setValue('u_status', 6);
        pJob.setValue('u_purge_end', gs.nowDateTime());
        pJob.update();
    },

    mDelete: function(table, limitRecords) {

        var mdObj = new GlideRecord(table);
        mdObj.addEncodedQuery("sys_idIN" + limitRecords);
        mdObj.query();
        mdObj.deleteMultiple();

    },
    type: 'tablesToPurge'
};]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>snc_operator_cnavrati</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-17 09:30:57</sys_created_on><sys_id>2c2aa692db32c210b1ba54ebd396196e</sys_id><sys_mod_count>33</sys_mod_count><sys_name>tablesToPurge</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_2c2aa692db32c210b1ba54ebd396196e</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>snc_operator_cnavrati</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-16 13:43:57</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update><sys_dictionary action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE" element="u_purge_end" table="u_ecase_purge_table"><active>true</active><array>false</array><attributes/><audit>false</audit><calculation><![CDATA[(function calculatedFieldValue(current) {

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_18d8721adbb2c210b1ba54ebd3961993
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.clTablesToPurge</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description>ClientCaalacle script inctude with functions for purfing records fromthe tables</description><name>clTablesToPurge</name><script><![CDATA[var clTablesToPurge = Class.create();
clTablesToPurge.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {
    /**
     *function returns the condition for the purging encQuery 
     * @param    {String}   start date.
     * @param    {String}   end date.
     * @returns  {String}   encoded query.
     **/
    chCondition: function() {
        var sDate = this.getParameter('sysparm_sDate');
        var eDate = this.getParameter('sysparm_eDate');
        var conndition = "sys_created_onBETWEENjavascript:gs.dateGenerate('" + sDate.split(" ")[0] + "', '" + sDate.split(" ")[1] + "')@javascript:gs.dateGenerate('" + eDate.split(" ")[0] + "', '" + eDate.split(" ")[1] + "')";

        return conndition.toString();

    },


    /* Function to count the records from table based on the encoded query 
     * @param  {String} tblN - name of the table to count from
     * @param  {String} encQ - Encoded query string
     * output - writes in the log the counts
     * */
    calcRec: function() {
        var tblN = this.getParameter('sysparm_TName');
        var encQ = this.getParameter('sysparm_encQ');
        var count = new global.tablesToPurge().countRecords(tblN, encQ);
        return count;

    },
    /*function returns true/false if provided table has index for sys_created_on field
     * @param    {String}   table name.
     * @returns  {String}   true/false.
     **/
    hasCreatedIndex: function() {
        var tableName = this.getParameter('sysparm_tbName');
        var tableId = this.getTableID(tableName);
        var grVIC = new GlideRecord('v_index_creator');
        grVIC.addEncodedQuery("table=" + tableId + "^index_col_nameLIKEsys_created_on");
        grVIC.setLimit(1);
        grVIC.query();
        return grVIC.hasNext().toString();

    },

    /*function returns true/false if provided table has set no_audit_delete
     * @param    {String}   table name.
     * @returns  {String}   true/false.
     **/
    hasAudDelete: function() {
        var tableName = this.getParameter('sysparm_tbName');
        var encq = "schema.name=" + tableName + "^attribute.name=no_audit_delete^value!=false";
        var grAtr = new GlideRecord('sys_schema_attribute_m2m');
        grAtr.addEncodedQuery(encq);
        grAtr.setLimit(1);
        grAtr.query();
        return grAtr.hasNext().toString();

    },
	
    /*function returns true/false if records in provided table are deletable
     * @param    {String}   table name.
     * @returns  {String}   true/false.
     **/
    isDeletable: function() {
        var tableName = this.getParameter('sysparm_tbName');
		 
        //var encq = "name=" + tableName + "sys_scope!=global^delete_access=true";
        var grTbl = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
		if (grTbl.get('name', tableName)){
			if(grTbl.sys_scope =='global'){
				return true;
			} else {
				return grTbl.delete_access.toString();
			}
		}

        // grTbl.addEncodedQuery(encq);
        // grTbl.setLimit(1);
        // grTbl.query();
        // return grVIC.hasNext().toString();
    },


    getTableID: function(tName) {
        var grSDO = new GlideRecord('sys_db_object');
        if (grSDO.get("name", tName)) {
            return grSDO.getValue('sys_id');
        }
    },

    type: 'clTablesToPurge'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>snc_operator_cnavrati</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-17 10:40:22</sys_created_on><sys_id>18d8721adbb2c210b1ba54ebd3961993</sys_id><sys_mod_count>39</sys_mod_count><sys_name>clTablesToPurge</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_18d8721adbb2c210b1ba54ebd3961993</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>snc_operator_cnavrati</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-07-19 12:28:57</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><business_calendar/><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><entered_time/><max_drift/><name>Run purging jobs_3</name><offset/><offset_type>0</offset_type><run_as display_value="Operator Ctirad Navratil">6df6d9491bd445d81a46b80c9b4bcb09</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period>1970-01-01 00:03:00</run_period><run_start>2024-06-21 13:45:57</run_start><run_time>1969-12-31 23:00:00</run_time><run_type>periodically</run_type><script><![CDATA[(function() {
    var maxParalelJobs = gs.getProperty('dhlex.purge.concurrent_jobs', 1);
    var tableName = 'u_ecase_purge_table';
    if (new global.tablesToPurge().getJob(tableName, maxParalelJobs)) {
        new global.tablesToPurge().purgeFrom(tableName, current.name);
    }
})();]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>snc_operator_cnavrati</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-25 17:31:26</sys_created_on><sys_id>be05690ddbcb0a50b1ba54ebd3961929</sys_id><sys_mod_count>6</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Run purging jobs_3</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_be05690ddbcb0a50b1ba54ebd3961929</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>snc_operator_cnavrati</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-26 15:31:21</sys_updated_on><time_zone/><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sysauto_script"><sysauto_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><business_calendar/><condition/><conditional>false</conditional><entered_time/><max_drift/><name>Run purging jobs_2</name><offset/><offset_type>0</offset_type><run_as display_value="Operator Ctirad Navratil">6df6d9491bd445d81a46b80c9b4bcb09</run_as><run_as_tz/><run_dayofmonth>1</run_dayofmonth><run_dayofweek>1</run_dayofweek><run_period>1970-01-01 00:05:00</run_period><run_start>2024-06-21 13:45:57</run_start><run_time>1969-12-31 23:00:00</run_time><run_type>periodically</run_type><script><![CDATA[(function() {

    var maxParalelJobs = gs.getProperty('dhlex.purge.concurrent_jobs', 1);
    var tableName = 'u_ecase_purge_table';
    if (new global.tablesToPurge().getJob(tableName, maxParalelJobs)) {
        new global.tablesToPurge().purgeFrom(tableName, current.name);
    }
})();]]></script><sys_class_name>sysauto_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>snc_operator_cnavrati</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2024-06-25 17:32:35</sys_created_on><sys_id>7b45690ddbcb0a50b1ba54ebd396197f</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Run purging jobs_2</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Global" source="global">global</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sysauto_script_7b45690ddbcb0a50b1ba54ebd396197f</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>snc_operator_cnavrati</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-06-26 15:31:58</sys_updated_on><time_zone/><upgrade_safe>false</upgrade_safe></sysauto_script></record_update>

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_a4c56c99db210950b1ba54ebd39619e0
sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>global.Validate_Date</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>true</client_callable><description/><name>Validate_Date</name><script><![CDATA[var Validate_Date = Class.create();
Validate_Date.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    /**
     *function checks if selected day is not longer than defined in "admin_access_required_days" property
     **/
    isValid: function() {
        var reqdDate = this.getParameter('sysparm_reqdDate');
        var rDate = new GlideDateTime(reqdDate);
        var daysAllowed = parseInt(gs.getProperty("admin_access_required_days"));
        /*var daysWithBuffer = daysAllowed + 1;
        daysWithBuffer = daysWithBuffer * (-1);
        var result = rDate.compareTo(new GlideDateTime(gs.daysAgo(daysWithBuffer)));
        if (result > 0)
            return false;
        else
            return true;*/
		return this.isWithinRange(rDate,daysAllowed);

    },

	isWithinRange: function(datetime,numDays){        
		var daysWithBuffer = numDays + 1;
        daysWithBuffer = daysWithBuffer * (-1);
		var result = datetime.compareTo(new GlideDateTime(gs.daysAgo(daysWithBuffer)));
        if (result > 0)
            return false;
        else
            return true;

	},

    /**
     *function checks if selected day is not longer than defined in "admin_access_required_days" property
     **/
    isBefore: function() {
        var reqdDate = this.getParameter('sysparm_reqdDate');
        var compareDate = this.getParameter('sysparm_compareDate');
        var rDate = new GlideDateTime(reqdDate);
        var cDate = new GlideDateTime(compareDate);
        var result = rDate.compareTo(cDate);
        if (result > 0)
            return false;
        else
            return true;

    },

    /**
     *function checks if selected day is not last 30 days
     **/
    ch30days: function() {
        var reqdDate = this.getParameter('sysparm_reqdDate');
        return this.isWithinRange(new GlideDateTime(reqdDate),-28)
    },

    /**
     *function gets default expiration date defined in "admin_access_required_days" property
     **/
    getDefaultExpDate: function() {
        var rDate = new GlideDate();
        var daysAllowed = parseInt(gs.getProperty("admin_access_required_days"));
        rDate.addDays(daysAllowed + 1);
        return rDate.getDisplayValue();

    },
    type: 'Validate_Date'
